mapper.select: SELECT ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT_UUID AS arrangeRecordsResultUuid, CONTAINER_UUID AS containerUuid, AGGREGATION_UUID AS aggregationUuid, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, ARRANGED_DATE AS arrangedDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid FROM ST_ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT

SELECT ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT_UUID AS arrangeRecordsResultUuid, CONTAINER_UUID AS containerUuid, AGGREGATION_UUID AS aggregationUuid, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, ARRANGED_DATE AS arrangedDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid FROM ST_ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT WHERE ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT_UUID = #{arrangeRecordsResultUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT SET CONTAINER_UUID = #{containerUuid}, AGGREGATION_UUID = #{aggregationUuid}, ITEM_UUID = #{itemUuid}, STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, ARRANGED_DATE = #{arrangedDate}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid} WHERE ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT_UUID = #{arrangeRecordsResultUuid}

INSERT INTO ST_ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT ( ARRANGE_RECORDS_RESULT_UUID, CONTAINER_UUID, AGGREGATION_UUID, ITEM_UUID, STATUS_UUID, ARRANGED_DATE, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, UPDATE_DATE, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID ) VALUES ( #{arrangeRecordsResultUuid}, #{containerUuid}, #{aggregationUuid}, #{itemUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{arrangedDate}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{updateDate}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid} )
